bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully butted w/ ORE DT, DJ/4x geo, forged/relieved 1-1/8" to 1-1/2" tapered HT (includes reducer), forged BB shell w/ integrated ISCG tabs, forged horizontal dropouts w/ forged replaceable alloy derrailleur hanger and singlespeed axle carriers, integrated chain tensioners w/ nylock hardware

components.description: Integrated 1-1/8" and 1-1/2" threadless, Campy-style 1-1/8" upper with 1-1/2" lower, full cartridge bearings, w/ 1-1/8" adapter and extra lower bearing
Collar, single and multispeed hardware, owner's manual
